original_text: the weight of the golden lampstands and their lamps, the weight of gold for each lampstand and its lamps, the weight of silver for a lampstand and its lamps, according to the use of each lampstand in the service,
korean_text: 또 금 등잔대들과 그 등잔 곧 각 등잔대와 그 등잔을 만들 금의 무게와 은 등잔대와 그 등잔을 만들 은의 무게를 각기 그 기구에 알맞게 하고

sentences.original_text: the weight of the golden lampstands and their lamps
the weight of gold for each lampstand and its lamps
sentences.korean_translation: 각 등잔대와 그 등잔들을 위한 금의 무게

sentences.original_text: the weight of silver for a lampstand and its lamps
sentences.korean_translation: 등잔대와 그 등잔들을 위한 은의 무게

sentences.original_text: according to the use of each lampstand in the service
